info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description: Returns all plants from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

post.description: Creates a new plant in the store

requestBody.description: Plant to add to the store

delete.description: Deletes a single plant based on the ID supplied

requestBody.description: Plant to add to the store

country.description: Country where the company is based

datetime.description: Date and time the company was created

sunday.description: true if company operates on Sunday

monday.description: true if company operates on Monday

tuesday.description: true if company operates on Tuesday

wednesday.description: true if company operates on Wednesday

thusrday.description: true if company operates on Thursday

friday.description: true if company operates on Friday

saturday.description: true if company operates on Saturday

what_you_get.description: List of things/values the client will get

datetime.description: Date and time the product was created

last_updated.description: Date and time the product was last updated

what_you_get.description: Describe what the buyer will be getting

datetime.description: Date and time the consultation was created

role_name.description: Role of the consultant within the company
